Module Contents

payment_simulator.utils.anomaly_parameter(x_start: float, x_end: float, rate: float, current: int, anomaly_start: int, anomaly_end: int) → float[source]
payment_simulator.utils.random_payment_value() → float[source]

Computes a random value based on a log-normal distribution.

Parameters:

args – Parameters for the lognormal distribution, typically mean and standard deviation.

Returns:

A random value sampled from a log-normal distribution.

payment_simulator.utils.random_payment_timing(open_time: datetime.time, close_time: datetime.time) → datetime.time[source]

Generates a random datetime within the operation period defined by the open and close times.

Parameters:

  • open_time – Opening time of the operation period.

  • close_time – Closing time of the operation, must be after the open time.

  • args – Additional arguments to be passed to the uniform distribution, typically the bounds for the random period.

Returns:

A random datetime within the specified operation period.

payment_simulator.utils.calc_num_payments(G: networkx.DiGraph) → int[source]
payment_simulator.utils.calculate_network_params(G: networkx.DiGraph) → dict[source]

Calculates and returns various parameters of the simulation such as connectivity, reciprocity, and degrees.

Returns:

Dictionary containing calculated simulation parameters.
